input: Frequent disconnections from the network during live lectures and online exams are causing us to miss important content and restart exams.
The slow internet speed on campus is making it difficult to access essential online educational resources, causing delays in completing assignments and participating in discussions
The overcrowded classrooms are making it difficult to focus and participate in discussions due to the excessive noise and lack of space.
Overcrowded classrooms are resulting in poor ventilation and uncomfortable conditions, making it hard to concentrate during lectures.
Many teachers feel that the training sessions are too theoretical and not practical enough, making it difficult to apply the knowledge in real classroom situations.
The limited focus on differentiated instruction in teacher training is leaving educators unprepared to meet the diverse needs of all students.
